title: Any suggestions to improve my internet, without attempting to call Optus
body: As of late, the company Optus has been a shithole for just about anything. Unfortunately, I have to deal with this until I get a full-time job and my own house... after all, still living with my parent with a decent part-time job. I need any suggestions to improve the internet I have now or get it back up to the speed or more I had originally. Since the lines were installed for NBN (not that they've actually activated it), the internet went from 1.5 mbs to 200-300kbs. That is a ridiculous drop... The only thing I have been considering is buying a new modem, since the modem is just one of those cheap ones that come with the internet package....

replies.body: Have you tried calling the council about it? Considering they're the ones that installed it and all, to *improve* your connection, not make it worse.
